name: Pico Engine
description:
Simple 3D Engine in PICO-8!

By Matheus Mortatti

/***************

 * TUTORIAL *

****************/

Arrows -> Rotate Camera

Z -> Move Backwards

X -> Move Forward

S - F -> Rotate the Sun!

Shift -> Toggle Debug Information
